title: Fundamentals of Swift Programming
headline: This free online course teaches you how to program in Swift, the most powerful and dynamic language for iOS apps.
description: Swift is one of the most popular new languages in the developer's world for writing iOS apps. It is a great time to learn Swift after it was recently voted one of the most beloved new languages by software developers around the globe. Apple’s Swift is open-source and here to stay. This course guides you to learn basic and advanced programming in Swift and quickly helps you become an expert iOS developer. Join this rewarding journey now.

courseDescription:
Swift is an interactive and dynamic programming language developed by Apple to create apps for iOS, macOS, watchOS and other products. It is now the language of choice for developers to create tools and apps for Apple products. Learning Swift instils a competitive advantage in the application development scene and is now the go-to direction for both fresh and seasoned developers to move forward. So if you are a student who wants to make a career in software development, somebody who wants to raise his skill set and competencies or anybody interested in programming, then you’re in the right place. This course will help you learn to write Swift code, create awesome iOS apps and become a star Swift programmer and developer. 

Focused primarily on the core language or programming, we guide you through the fundamentals of coding with Swift. You will learn how to write iOS apps from the ground up. Designed for beginners, this course incorporates theoretical and practical approaches to programming in Swift language. We cover all core concepts and features of Swift like variables and strings, creating your first app, branching, collections and loops, functions, enumerations, structures and classes. You will gain practical exposure and prepare you to use Swift as a professional. This course also offers a bonus: compiled Swift programming source codes that you can download as a zip file and use. 

So whether you are a beginner who wants to make a career in development, a professional who wants to improve their skill set, or simply interested in programming to create your apps, this course is for you. By the end of this master class, you will be confident enough to experiment and work fluently with swift coding, develop iOS applications and be ready to advance further into Swift programming. So enrol today and get started.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.details: Introduction and Creating your First App
modules.description: This module introduces you to the world of swift. You will learn to set up and begin with Xcode, the dedicated platform used to build apps for Apple platforms and create your first app. Recognize Swift elements like variables, strings, statements, and operators and learn how to use them for coding or programming in swift.
topics: Introduction and Creating your First App – Learning Outcomes
Introduction, Using Variables and Manipulating Strings
Introduction and Creating your First App - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This module covers Collections, Loops, Functions, and Enumerations. These are some important parts of Swift programming. You will learn the process and understand how to apply them to achieve the desired objective in your application.
topics: Collections, Loops, Functions and Enumerations - Learning Outcomes
Collections, Loops, Functions and Enumerations- Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.details: Structures and Classes in Swift Programming
modules.description: This module takes you deep into programming with swift and provides a detailed understanding of structures, classes, protocols, and optional. Learn about their functionalities, uses, and types and get o know how to program them for the desired objective.
topics: Structures and Classes in Swift Programming – Learning Outcomes
Structures and Classes in Swift Programming - Lesson Summary
